title: Gross Domestic Product: Government for United States Metropolitan Portion
notes:
Government includes the executive, legislative, judicial, administrative and regulatory activities of Federal, state, local, and international governments.

Consists of all counties in a state that are parts of metropolitan statistical areas.

For more information about this release go to http://www.bea.gov/newsreleases/regional/gdp_metro/gdp_metro_newsrelease.htm.
